reviews.review:
Amazing game that uses innovative mechanics in first person for a mind bending experience. with a fantastically dark sense of humour, I would recommend to anyone. It is a bit short though...

10/10

Side note - perhaps it's amazing quality comes from the fact that valve cut 40% of the  game off before it could show it's bad parts...
Good game if you're into puzzle games that challenge you.
Just. Amazing. Great idea (i.e portals) at it's core, and a absoloutly stunning storyline. Just. Amazing

Pro:
-L'idea di fondo è geniale
-Il gameplay è scorrevole
-Il respawn è rapido ed il gioco non infierisce su di te
-I comandi non danno problemi
-I "dialoghi" sono divertentissimi (se sapete l'inglese)
-La trama è avvincente e autoconclusiva
-Vi piacerà statene certi

Contro:
-Dura poche ore
-Il secondo è migliore, ma DOVETE giocare questo prima, per godervi il 2 appieno
-E' abbastanza facile
-L'audio è in inglese

Conclusioni:
Andate a comprarvi il bundle col 2 con i saldi e tornate a ringraziarmi.

ADORABILE!
Davvero uno dei giochi più divertenti a cui abbia avuto il piacere di dedicarmi!
Stra-consigliato!
Bella storia segreta nascosta nel gioco.

Das Spiel ist einfach nur genial!
Obwohl ich es bei einem bekannten Let's Player damals im Livestream bereits gesehen habe, musste ich es dennoch selbst noch einmal spielen. Ich denke inzwischen kennt jeder dieses Spiel und doch will ich ein kurzes Review verfassen. 
mit viel Witz und tollen Rätseln schafft es Portal mich als Spieler/Textsubjekt gut zu unterhalten. Druch die Portale kann und muss man oft "um die Ecke" denken und dank GLADOS fühlt man sich nicht ganz so einsam, wie man eigentlich ist - natürlich hilft auch der Companion-Cube dabei :)
Alles in allem ein tolles Spiel, das - wie auch der Nachfolger - man einfach gespielt haben muss. Ein witziges Spiel mit nettem Rätselspaß.

Nie vergessen: The Cake is a lie! 
Und unbedingt die Credits anhören! :)

No lo he jugado lo bastante, pero se ve interesante a vista previa :)
9/10.
good

Este juego es: 
-gracioso
-dificil
-totalmente genial
-tan bueno que te deja jugando HORAS!
-tiene un objetivo simple
-19 capitulos cortos y geniales
10/10

Didn't take me much longer than an eye blink to finish the main story, but I found it to be a very enjoyable diversion.  The game consists primarily of spatial puzzles. You play a silent protagonist who is running through a figurative rat maze while a deeply snarky and sarcastic antagonist makes commentary (that had me laughing in quite a few instances).  It's good to finally have context for "the cake is a lie" - something most old-time FPSers from the Doom/Quake/Half-Life era will have heard at least once before.  If you'd like a quick puzzle jaunt, do pick this game up.  If you've never played a puzzle game before and aren't sure if you like puzzles yet, give it a whirl.  I'd say this is a fantastic and unique entry into the genre.
entertaining but too short (4 hours -_-)
10/10 would throw up again
very!very!very good!!!!!不过挑战地图没精力打了
Great game with an extraordinary look at motion in games. You won't know how crazy it feels to go through a portal until you have. Portal 2 is better though.
Not the cube. ANYTHING BUT THE CUBE!

Te hace pensar no como otros juegos la jugabilidad es perfecta te corre el juego hasta con una lap chafa a 60 fps con graficos a medio lo unico que tiene punto negativo es la escasidad de mapas :v bueno

Historia:9.2
Jugabilidad:9.6
Mapas:9.9
Durabilidad;7
 Eso es lo que yo opino no >:v alv
its cool

Intressting game, finished in less then 2 hours. 

10/10 would get cake again

游戏剧情完美，游戏性完美。
音效方面完美，画面完美。
一把传送枪，两个传送门，互相连通。
这种特有的操作方式就造就了传送门的趣味性。
剧情方面，玩过的都知道GLaDOS这个人物，玩通关之后才发现G娘（个人喜欢叫GLaDOS为G娘）的萌点满满w。
G娘给我的感受估计就是：“表面对人冷眼相加，却在背后默默给予帮助，可最后人们只记得她的冷漠，没人会记得她的善良。”给人感觉是个很无奈的角色，一个眼球架子，或者一个土豆（Portal2），给玩家造成对她独有的印象，可见portal在角色刻画方面下的功夫。
G娘的配音者Ellen，是学习过美声表演的，不仅ED唱的好，用声音对于G娘这种傲娇，外冷内热的性格刻画也是非常到位的。
游戏中的AI敌人，炮塔娘也是炒鸡萌的啊prprprprpr，尤其是当萌萌的声音说到“put me down”（放我下来QAQ）的时候被萌化了啊喂！“are you still there…？”（你…还在这里嘛qwq？）
……
这游戏真的太棒了，我不知道该怎么描述了…
ps：炮塔酱和GLaDOS是同一个cv。
pps：个人观点，不喜勿喷。
one of my all time fav!
Spooky house of jump scares was more fun to play than this asssucking game that thinks it's cleaver to put a portal insted of a O .....ohhh I'm so samrt bu-hu
强推，策略+手速，就是无解的眩晕感令人想呕吐。

J'ai fait ce jeu après avoir fait le 2, mais ça a été un plaisir de remonter aux sources, d'autant plus que ce jeu contient des éléments qui n'ont pas été réintroduits dans le second opus.

En revanche, sa durée de vie est relativement réduite.
They should call this Portal 2 becaue you get 2 portals
purchase this
Best game ever
gra spoko ale za krótka. skończyłem ją w mniej niż 2 godziny

Awesome game, a must buy. I purchased as part of the Orange Box during the summer sale, and felt that Portal offered a thoroughly unique gaming experience. Funny, challenging, and enjoyable, a great puzzle game.
不用多說
Good Game
말이 필요없는 명작

Hello, this is Cave Johnson. I want to personally welcome you and express our sincerest appreciation for your interest in the Aperture Science Handheld Portal Device Enrichment Simulator! For several decades, we here at the Aperture Science Enrichment Center have worked tirelessly to ensure that all of our activities are as challenging as they are stimulating. Please note that although rigorous testing has proven this game to be completely safe, we have recently added consequences for failure. Upon receiving your personalized [i]Orientation Packet[/i], it is strongly recommended that you review and familiarize yourself with the [i]Safety Materials and Ethical Guidelines[/i] data sheet. You will also need to completely fill out, sign, and return the included [i]Unlimited Liability and Arbitration Waiver[/i]. For more information, please attend an Enrichment Center Participant Safety seminar. Good luck, and happy testing!

I'm Rick Harrison, and this is my pawn shop. I work here with my old man and my son, Big Hoss. Everything in here has a story and a price. One thing I've learned after 21 years - you never know what is gonna come through that door.

Along with the other games in the Orange Box, Portal is a must have

Portal is an amazing experience that everyone that plays games should experience

9/10

This game has a good reason to be considered a masterpiece.

Gameplay-wise, this game will not give you value for money. I've finished the game twice in 9 hours of total playtime, but nonetheless, it's a joy to experience. It's best to go into it knowing nothing about it, like most brilliant games out there, but by this point in time every second steam user knows what it is. It's always worth a play, if you're a puzzle-platformer fan or not, as the puzzles are fairly easy but satisfying to solve.

You've missed out on something special if you haven't played this yet, so I recommend you pick it up (preferably in a sale or something).
Play Portal. Play it now. You will not regret it. It is a great puzzle FPS physics thing and I love it.

Portal and Portal 2 are two of my favorite games for the xbox 360 and PC.  Portal 2 is a much stronger game but Portal 1 is still fun and I think it works up a sense of dread or alarm very well as the game goes on.  The characters in this series are hilarious and well fleshed out, the lore is interesting, the puzzles are very engaging and fun (and they are also at just the right difficulty throughout both games), the atmosphere is perfect, and the is just flat out funny.  If you like dry humor, dark humor, and sarcasm, this is the series for you.  Also the pricing is very fair, worth every penny.  PLAY IT.

Also.

The cake is a lie.

No hay mucho que decir referente a este juego. Un juego de puzzles con un toque muy distinto gracias al tema de los portales y que tendras unas horas de diversion aseguradas asi que no te lo pienses mucho mas
Le jeu ne vaut pas son prix mais reste intéréssant si vous pouvez l'avoir en promo.

[h1]THIS GAME SCORES [0 1 | 2 *3*] = ~88% (75%-100%)[/h1]

A great 1st person puzzle game, and a great example of how some glimpses of things behind the scenes can add up to a story with quite desirable emotional content. (That's all I say because spoilers.) Portal's content, graphics, sounds, story, tech deserve a firm thumbs-up with both hands.

Portal is a great example of non-Euclidean geometry in a game. You enter a hole in the wall, but you don't end up on the other side of the wall, and even the visual appearance behaves accordingly.



[h1]OTHER GAMES WITH PORTALS / "PREY"[/h1]

[url=www.digipen.edu/fileadmin/website_data/gallery/game_websites/NarbacularDrop]Narbacular Drop[/url] by Nuclear Monkey Software was the prototype game with user-placeable portals that lead to the creation of Portal, and (most of?) that team ended up on Valve's Portal team. That game is also worth a play.

But the first game I know of that used portal technology was [url=en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prey_(2006_video_game)]Prey[/url] (2006), a [i]really good[/i] 1st person shooter. Incidentally, I bought it for €1 in a German retail store a few days ago (but had played it before; those were the days when you installed a DVD without having to download anything else), so I know that it's sadly not available on Steam.

With little config file editing, Prey runs on 1920x1080, at least that's what I set in the file, but what I saw on screen rather looked like 4K for some reason. Maybe it was indeed 4K contrary to my choice because to achieve custom resolutions, you also have to set a screen mode variable, and maybe this leads to the game using desktop resolution.

I had to turn off anti-aliasing because the frame-rate was not fluid even though my machine can't be the reason - must be the old engine. Frame-rate is fluid without AA, and I didn't miss the AA, so it probably was indeed 4K.

Config file editing allows to set arbitrary FoV.

I played a few minutes on Windows 10 with August 2016 anniversary update on a GTX980.

So, if you can get your hands on Prey today (2016), you can still play it very well, and it's still a great game. And even though it's the first non-Euclidean-geometry game (that I know of), it's very already very well done.

The original portal is a really good game, however I suggest getting portal 2 for the multiplayer and level greater.
8/10

Un juego en el que tienes que romperte literalmente la cabeza para avanzar las etapas, me gusto un monton aunque me alla dado muchos dolores de cabeza xD. La movilidad es buena y para el año en k se izo encunetro que los graficos estan bien.

[h1]Introdução[/h1]

Portal se trata de um jogo Single Player do gênero Puzzle em Primeira Pessoa. O jogo possui uma excelente história por trás de seus acontecimentos anteriores e atuais, além de um senso de humor q mistura ironia / sarcarsmo com humor negro.

O jogo se passa nos Aperture Laboratories, uma famigerada e misteriosa instalação científica conhecida pela dedicação e empenho em desenvolver ciência por meio da constante aplicação de testes em suas cobaias.

Vc assume o papel de uma cobaia de testes em particular, a qual possui um objetivo bem simples: começar e terminar uma bateria de testes científicos sob a orientação e vigilância de uma "voz" desconhecida.

Quase todos os testes científicos envolvem o uso da Portal Gun, um aparelho capaz de aprimorar sua movimentação pelas câmaras de testes ( Test Chambers ), este dispositivo permite q o jogador manipule sua propria velocidade de movimento de forma a concluir os testes propostos e o mesmo tbm pode ser utilizado para a obtenção de itens chave essenciais para a conclusão de certos testes.

[h1]Aspectos dos quais gostei[/h1]

[b]- História[/b]
Como já mencionei na introdução, vc entra no papel de uma cobaia de testes silenciosa ( aparentemente sem nome e sem uma história própria ) cujo o objetivo é iniciar e terminar uma sequência de testes científicos sob a orientação e vigilância de uma "voz" desconhecida. A mesma "voz" afirma em diversos momentos q quando todos os testes forem cumpridos, haverá bolo como "recompensa".

Quem é responsável pela orientação, vigilância e manutenção destes testes é a supercomputador / robô GLaDOS, uma máquina portadora de Inteligência Artificial ( IA) e de conhecimento infinito. Ela atua como administradora / gerente de toda a testagem científica q ocorre nos Laboratórios Aperture, garantindo q todos os procedimentos e métodos sejam executados "dentro dos conformes" na busca dos resultados esperados.

Por possuir uma IA, GLaDOS possui comportamento humano embutido em seu interior. Uma prova disso é q em suas conversas com a protagonista, é possível notar q ela frequentemente faz uso de sarcarsmo / ironia e tbm certo humor negro quando se comunica com a mesma, o q serve de base para criar vários diálogos bem humorados conforme vc avança pelo jogo.

A história de Portal é pouco notável / pouco evidente no decorrer do jogo. Para q vc possa se entrosar melhor, é preciso manter certa atenção nos cenários / Levels, pois estes guardam pistas / detalhes a respeito da história e dos personagens. Se preferir, vc tbm pode fazer pesquisas para assim melhor compreender a história de Portal.

Vc começa a entender melhor a história a partir do momento em q vc absorve informações o suficiente enquanto joga e então passa a fazer conexões / associações entre uma coisa e outra.

[b]-Jogabilidade[/b]
Este aspecto ao mesmo tempo simples porém original e muito bem aplicado, tem como base o uso do equipamento chamado de Portal Gun. Por meio do seu raciocício lógico somado ao potencial deste dispositivo, vc será capaz de progredir pelos Puzzles ao longo do jogo.

O potencial da Portal Gun permite q o jogador preserve aplicações Físicas ( como inércia e aceleração ) de forma a empregar isso para finalizar os Puzzles e tbm possibilita o transporte de itens q são / serão essenciais para o progresso pelos mesmos.

[b]-Trilha Sonora[/b]
Portal dispõe de uma modesta e tbm um tanto "discreta" trilha sonora, entretanto as músicas não deixam de ser agradáveis, justamente pq elas combinam bastante com as situações / momentos pelos quais vc passa ao longo do jogo.

A maioria das músicas não são notadas / reparadas de imediato pelos jogadores, justamente pq são suaves e tranquilas de se ouvirem [strike]( Com exceção, por exemplo, do tema q toca durante os créditos )[/strike].

-Potencial de Rejogabilidade / Replay
Além da campanha principal existem Test Chambers de dificuldade adicional e tbm Desafios (Challenges) em Test Chambers específicas, nesse último caso a ideia se baseia na conclusão de objetivos pré-determinados. Se vc curte faturar Conquistas ( Achievements ), Portal pode ser uma boa alternativa para se fazer esse tipo de coisa. 

[spoiler]Se vc for realmente catar 100% dos Achievements, tenta evitar de ficar apelando pra Glitches o tempo todo, ou não né, afinal eu não posso te dizer como vc deve viver sua vida[/spoiler]

Um último detalhe nesse aspecto é q é possível vc ativar os Comentários dos Desenvolvedores antes de iniciar um novo jogo, com isso vc aprende / descobre curiosidades sobre os procedimentos usados para dar origem a Portal.

[h1]Aspecto do qual não gostei[/h1]

[b]-Duração da campanha[/b]
Na minha opinião, esse é a única característica negativa com relação ao jogo. É possível chegar ao final da campanha em cerca de 4 horas, umas 5 horas no máximo. Se bem q, se a duração da campanha fosse maior, muito provavelmente o jogo acabaria se tornando um tanto repetitivo no final das contas.

[h1]Conclusão[/h1]
Com certeza recomendo esse fantástico jogo. Se vc valoriza uma boa história além de curtir puzzles mentalmente estimulantes e tbm possui um senso de humor meio "ácido", então vc sem dúvida não irá se arrepender de comprar Portal [spoiler]e é quase certo tbm q vai comprar, jogar e adorar Portal 2[/spoiler]

Minha nota para Portal é 9,5/10
its su kul3

Un bon jeu de réflexion.

- Ambiance et humour noir bien travaillés.
- Quelques passages difficiles, notamment parmi les niveaux bonus et les défis.
- Jeu court.
- Graphismes très corrects, pour un jeu datant quand même de 2007.
- Manette Xbox One supportée, avec quelques bugs parfois.
Portal is awesome... that is all.

[h1]И вот 16-й год, а я впервые прошёл Portal[/h1]
Хотя рекомендовали мне ещё в год выхода, когда сам ещё в школе был. 
А теперь наверстываю упущенное ^^
Но у Valve как всегда - игра ни капли не устарела и остается такой же потрясающей даже сейчас.
Да, она уже может зачастую не удивить какими-то сложностями, невероятными подачами или просто некст-геном. Но Портал любят в первую очередь за: механику порталов, ГЛАДОС и почти идеальный игровой дизайн.

[h1]Влюбляет:[/h1]
+ Дизайн как визуальный, так и игровой. Чётко выверенные механики, по которым игрок скользит, но всё ещё получает удовольствие от процесса этих пазлов
+ Саундтрек. Прекрасная музыка для прекрасной игры.
+ Искусственный интеллект ГЛАДОС, но в представлении уже не нуждается. Саркастичное злючное милашество :)
+ Минимализм в основе в совокупности с "закулисьем" к концу игры - всё это в общей картине создает хороший сюжет и целостность происходящего. Собственно, зная что есть 2-я часть я несомненно захочу получить продолжение, после такой триумфальной первой части.

[h1]Чуток неприятностей:[/h1]
- В целом я ничего не имею против системы порталов, но головокружение можно заполучить, когда вас раз за разом переворачивает от телепорта :D
- Достаточно короткая, всего на 2-3 часа чистого геймплея по основному сюжету. Есть челенджи ещё, но это лишь как бонусный контент.

Для меня также является интересным, что Portal хоть и паззл с сюжетом и новаторской механикой - всё это часть вселенной Half-Life, и это ещё больше завлекает в изучение всего вокруг.

[h1]Вдобавок[/h1]
Я прошёл игру 2 раза за день. Первое прохождение обычное, а вот на втором с огромным интересом побежал в прохождение с комментаряими разработчиков. Пожалуй, инди-девам следует учиться внимательности к деталям, даже самым мельчайшим, именно у них.
Даже самые навороченные игры текущих лет зачастую не содержат столь чистой, вылизанной и отполированной механики и гейм-дизайна, не говоря уже о бюджетных индюшатинах.

Но просто прислушайтесь.
Если вы хотите заниматься разработкой, поиграйте в игры от Valve, и везде постарайтесь изучить комментарии разработчиков, понять как именно и в каких направлениях они столь усердно проникались процессом разработки, со всей профессиональностью.

[h1]Оценка: A++[/h1]
* и хорошо что вальв зажирательством на старых играх не занимаются, как некоторые издатели после психоза у курса
** а тем временем меня ждёт 2я часть :з

В ЖЕЛАЕМОМ  

Рекомендованное
От вашего друга Kubn2respawn
“So I don't have technically problems with this game like a lot of players which writining reviews, but for me game too don't work very good 40-80fps (on i7 4770k and gtx980 on max details 1440p) which isnt really good FPS because this game didn't look amazing.

The main problem of this game is big world where you have nothing to do. Flying from planet to planet, discover new animals, upgrading your gear and etc. is fun but for how long? The next problem is so small inventory, in this game you have too many raw materials and items and your inventory being very fast full.

Space Station... come on, planets are automatically generated and thats ok, but every space station is exactly the same and they are very very simple, how hard is create 3 diffrent space stations like small towns in space full of NPCs?

If this game would have real multiplayer where players can have own planets, and build buildings on this planets, buying and collecting starships, fighting with others this game will be 10/10. Now there is nothing to do.

In my opinion this game is overhyped and for sure not worth 60 euros, maybe 30 euros, I recommend this game because I have some fun for first hours and I belive developer will add new content soon as possible.

tl;dr

pros
-fun in first hours
-flying gives fun
-no loading screens
-a lot of raw materials
-you can fast lern periodic table symbols 
-big world...

cons
-...where is nothing to do
-low resolution textures on planets
-not great optimization
-no multiplayer
-for me no fun in longer term”

超赞的解密游戏！难度不算特别高，但是很多关卡设计的很巧妙。唯一的美中不足就是没有联机系统，导致你通关后就懒得打第二次了。

A very entertaining game till the end, Portal was a huge blast for me 

I had heard quite good things about the game (even spoilers), it got the attention of my curiosity and caused me to have very high expectations of this fairly old game
Playing the first few test chambers and hearing the dialogue, i was disappointed because i didn't get most of the jokes and had thus dropped it for maybe 2-3 months
But when i had really nothing new to play, i came back to this game and paid more attention to the dialogue or more specifically on GLaDOS
After that i enjoyed every single minute of the game and its cleverness

To really enjoy this game play it in your own terms and really focus on the dialogue
I feel that the clever dialogue is what keeps the player to keep on going untill they finish the game

Un juego corto, pero que ha supuesto, por lo menos para mi, un soplo de aire fresco.
Hacia tiempo que escuché hablar de el, y realmente no le veia la gracia a eso de ir haciendo portales. Lo compre por casualidad con un pack de valve. Gracias a una tarde aburrida que me dio por instalarlo, descrubi esta pequeña maravilla.
Si no lo has probado ya estas perdiendo el tiempo.

Portal 2, es más y mejor....
好玩是好玩，不过玩起来实在是晕啊，稍久一会身体就很不舒服

Portal one was an exceptional start to the portal series great puzzles and great for people starting out new to steam.
Simplemente una obra maestra.

A very interesting little puzzle game. It really helps develop your "thinking outside the box" skills, and is wonderfully fun at the same time. I feel much smarter after playing this game, but whether I am or not, I had a blast.

İlk olarak Valve'e bana bu güzel deneyimi yşattığı için teşekkür ediyorum.
Şimdi 2-3 saatlik bir oyun hakkında ne kadar uzun bir inceleme yazabilirim diye düşünüyorum da kısa tutmak daha mantıklı.Malum ilk incelemem.
Oyun başlarda oldukça basit mekanikleri öğreterek başlatsada bir yerden sonra öğretmeyi bırakıyor. Açıklamak yerine Bizim çözememizi bekliyor ve sonrada "Very impressive" diyip olayı kapatıyor.
İlk birkaç bölüm aşırı basit olup canımı sıksa da ilerleyen bölümlerde zorluk seviyesi aşırı artıyor. Hele hele taretlerle antrenman yapmaya başladığım bölüm ... Kabus gibiydi. Ama tabii ki de ilerledikçe taretlerle başa çıkmayı öğreniyoruz kendi kendimize.
Laboratuvar bize 19 kademeli bir test e sokuyor. Biz bu testleri geçtiğimizde laboratuvardaki bir açıktan binanın içine sızıyoruz ve asıl oyun tam anlamıyla burda başlıyor. Nereye gidemeyeceğimizi bulamamak mi dersiniz , bulduktan sonra oraya ulaşmakta zorlanmak mı? Bazı yerler aşırı bir süre kısıtlamasına sokuyor ve içinize ben bunu hayatta yapamam diye bir kurt düşüyor.Sonra farkediyorsunuz ki daha kolay bir yol var.

Neyse daha fazla uzatmadan bitirişi yapayım. Oyunu bitirince oh dedim. Kapanmasını beklerken O giren kapanış jenariği ve şarkı beni benden aldı. Hatta sonlarına doğru ağlayabilirdima am son bir iki lafı o hissi sildi attı. Bitirip siz de dinleyin sırf o şarkı için bile oynanır o oyun. 
Ya puan verecek olursam 87/100 gibi birşey veririm herhalde. zamanına göre muhteşem mekanikleri var ve fizik kurallarına aşırı bağlı kullandıkları motor. Oynamanız kesinlikle tavsiye edilir .
jeh
스팀 입문작으로 자신있게 추천 가능한 게임
Way too eZ for meZ

Игра довольно старая, но даже сейчас в 2016 прошол на одном дыхании, а трэк в концовки игры закинул в свой плэйлист.

Головоломки разнообразны и местами заставляют подумать. Гладос на высоте - её приятно слушать и юмор и харизма, всё при ней.

Сейчас буду проходить вторую чать, а этой 4 часовой тренеровкой остался даволен и советую всем побывать в этой вселенной кто ещё этого не сделал. 
Всем удачи!!!
Very good, very short.

I've been meaning to play Portal for so long that when I saw it on sale I had to take the opportunity. I played it for a bit every day for around a week and managed to complete it. It definitely isn't a super long game, but the puzzles are fun and challenging and Glad0s is amazing. Can't wait to keep playing Portal 2 and enjoy more of her.

I loved portal 2, and thought it was amazing.

However, I recently downloaded the original, and LOVE IT!!
Keep up the awesome games Valve!!
This game keeps me entertained for hours, and I even bought the USB Turret....

Portall is a well made game. I love its atmosphere and Gladdos only adds too it. The puzzles are great and some are complex but each one feels original. I love how they turned such a simple concept into making such mind bending physics puzzles. The game is badly paced though but  I would still recomend it to anyone.
This is a Great game, and its alot of fun, puzzles that you just want to do again and again

I've heard of this game through the Cake is a Lie meme, but now after finally playing it on a Macbook capable of playing games on Steam, I truly loved it! :D

One of the best single player games ever (right behind Portal 2). This game is funny, challenging, and has some replayability if you want to go back and try to get gold medals on all the challenges. The main story is short, I beat it in one sitting (around 5 hours I think). I recommend getting this game in a bundle with Portal 2 and playing this first, then playing Portal 2, which is in my opinion the best single player game ever made.

This Game is a Logical Puzzle FPS BUT there is no shooting people in here you will have to go through lots of chambers which have diffrent puzzles in them some of them are very hard some are easy but there is secret plot with intrigue. This game is full of dark humour pretty imposible(sometimes you will spend 10 or more minutes looking for a hole) stuff which done well.

Portal: Juego de puzles en 3-d en primera persona.Tendras que valerte de tu ingenio y de la fisica para resolver los intricados puzzles que Glados,la psicopata sarcastica pero carismatica I.A que rejenta las instalaciones de Aperture Science pone ante ti y descubrir la manera de escapar del laberinto que conforma el complejo.Valiendote de una pistola de portales con la que podras no solo moverte con facilidad si no aprovechar algunas leyes basicas de la fisica para resolver puzzles tanto de peso ,cinetica, reflarcion de la luz y otros.Este juego es relativamente sencillo de jugar pero requerira toda tu atencion y inteligencia para sobrevivir a las trampas torretas y otros elementos que componen lugar.Recomiendo encarecidamente a los jugadores nuevos que se tomen su tiempo tanto,como para resolver los puzzles como para comprender todo el entorno futuristico distopico que les rodea.Este juego esta cargado de un humor muy acido en algunos momentos.Muy divertido y con mecanicas muy curiosas lo recomiendo mucho.
One of the best titles in the games industry.
I played this for the first time in January 2016, well after the meme had died. It was real fun and I'm looking forward to crushing the sequel.

Jogo muito bom e bem facil a historia mesmo sendo simples vc gosta querendo ver oque vai acontecer o jogo nao possui multiplayer,caso vc queira multiplayer compre portal 2 a historia de Portal pra mim e 8/10 jogabilidade incrivel fisica espetacular Recomendo!!
i think this game is really good  the story line is great and its all out a pretty good game.
Great game I would recommend is to anyone, is has a great plot and the phyisics are amazing
Honestly a classic, absolutely recommend playing both portal and portal 2.

[h1][b]В 2005 году несколько студентов выпускает бесплатную игру Narbacular Drop, геймплей которой представляет собой путешествие по подземелью и преодоление препятствий с помощью порталов. Их замечают люди из Valve и предлагают разработчикам присоединиться к компании. Дают им ресурсы и свободу творчества. Через два года на свет появляется Portal, с той же концепцией.[/b][/h1] 

Главная героиня, Челл, просыпается в своей камере отдыха подземного комплекса Aperture Science, предназначенного для изучения свойств порталов. Раздается женский механический голос. Это ГЛэДОС, она – суперкомпьютер и управляет этим комплексом. А еще она будет единственным нашим спутником на протяжении всей игры.
После инструктажа, в котором рассказывается, что Челл – подопытная, и именно ей предстоит изучать свойства именно этих самых порталов, нас на лифте отправляют в комнату с первой задачкой. Большую часть игры мы будем перемещаться по комнатам и решать задачки, ведь изучение порталов происходит в игровой форме. После решения последней задачи следует эпилог, дающий ответы на некоторые вопросы.
Персонажей в игре только два, а о главной героине известно только то, что она все время молчит, ходит босиком и к ее ногам прикреплены механизмы, защищающие от повреждений при падении с высоты. 
Гораздо больше раскрыта ГЛэДОС. Это по праву очень яркий персонаж. Являясь компьютером, она имеет сознание. Главными ее особенностями является любовь к тортам и к циничному черному юмору. В такой манере она комментирует прогресс успеха Челл. 

Из всего арсенала для преодоления головоломок у нас только портальная пушка, позволяющая создавать два портала – голубой и оранжевый. Создавать их можно только на определенных плоских поверхностях.
В игре 19 комнат, в которых проводятся тесты. Решение заданий в них представляет собой перемещение игрока из точки А в точку Б, попутно добыв специальный куб для того, чтобы положить его на большую красную кнопку, открывающую двери лифта. Общий алгоритм прохождения выглядит примерно так: выходим из лифта – проходим комнату – добываем куб – ставим куб на большую красную кнопку – заходим в лифт. По мере прохождения головоломки становятся сложнее. Добавляются новые препятствия и способы преодоления их. К примеру, в игре активно используется закон сохранения энергии. Проще говоря: если тело быстро влетает в один портал, то из другого оно также быстро вылетит.
Препятствия представляют собой стены, на которых невозможно создавать порталы, стены из силовых полей и воду, которой нельзя касаться. Рядовые противники в игре – турели с пулеметами или ракетницами. После прохождения тестовых комнат начинается коридорная локация с подгрузками, завершающаяся битвой с боссом. 
Помимо основной кампании, в игре присутствуют дополнительные усложненные миссии и миссии на время.
Забавно то, что в случае гибели в общих субтитрах появляется запись «Гордон погиб». Тут еще стоит отметить, что игра является частью вселенной Half-Life.

Графика выполнена стильно. При мрачной атмосфере тут преобладают светлые тона. Музыкальное сопровождение шикарное, особенно песня ГЛэДОС в финальных титрах. А также забавные реплики турелей, такие как: «Я лечу-у-у!», «Хватит, я все поняла.» или «Ой ой ой ой ойойойой.»

Игра короткая – это минус. На всем протяжении времени игра представляет собой этакое обучение и подготовку к сиквелу. Неторопливое, вдумчивое прохождение займет всего лишь четыре часа. Но и тут есть положительная сторона – разработчики не стали искусственно растягивать геймплей, дабы не оставалось неприятное послевкусие после прохождения.


[table]
[tr][th]Плюсы[/th][th]минусы[/th][/tr]
[tr][td][list][*]Сюжетный поворот в эпилоге;[*]Черный юмор; [*]Песня в финальных титрах.[/list][/td]
[td][list][*]Малая продолжительность.[/list][/td][/tr]
[/table]

[b]Подытожу:[/b] [i]Portal – шикарная игра. Тут вполне достаточно головоломок и юмора. А подача в стиле сюжетного минимализма наоборот только поддерживает общий стиль. 
И помните: Вы … торт.[/i]
